A supporter of Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan waves a scarf with an image of the president during a ceremony to mark the 562nd anniversary of the conquest of the city by Ottoman Turks, in Istanbul, Turkey, May 30, 2015.

Yemen’s conflict should be resolved by:

View answers without voting

Yemen’s conflict should be resolved by:

  • 11% - Saudi Arabia defeating Houthi rebels
  • 8% - Allowing the rebels to govern
  • 11% - Splitting the country in two again
  • 70% - Letting Yemenis sort it out for themselves
